## Private Member Attributes

### SSID {#a8d4ec755a316b5c55dd0038fce0f565c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="SyncScope::ID llvm::FenceInst::SSID">
The synchronization scope <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> of this fence instruction.

Not quite enough room in SubClassData for everything, so synchronization scope <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> gets its own field.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h/#l00488">488</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h">Instructions.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
